header.note: The character "%" (out of a numerical context) is a meta-character that will be replaced (often by a numeric value) before the string is displayed
Text between less than (<) and greater than (>) symbols is a variable's name and must not be localised

trans-unit.source: An interruption occurred while the data was being flushed to disk. Run 4D Tools to see if the data file is OK.
trans-unit.target: An interruption occurred while the data was being flushed to disk. Run 4D Tools to see if the data file is OK.

trans-unit.source: The Log File contains some data that has not been saved in the database.
trans-unit.target: The Log File contains some data that has not been saved in the database.

trans-unit.source: You should try to restore the Log File from your last backup if you want to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: You should try to restore the Log File from your last backup if you want to retrieve the data.

trans-unit.source: The database contains some data that was not saved in the Log File.
trans-unit.target: The database contains some data that was not saved in the Log File.

trans-unit.source: You should backup your database and start with a new Log File.
trans-unit.target: You should backup your database and start with a new Log File.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for record to be unlocked by process #
trans-unit.target: Waiting for record to be unlocked by process #

trans-unit.source: The Log File does not correspond to the data file.
trans-unit.target: The Log File does not correspond to the data file.

trans-unit.source: This is not the current Log File of this data file.
trans-unit.target: This is not the current Log File of this data file.

trans-unit.source: You need to backup your database before you can create a Log File. Click OK to start the backup.
trans-unit.target: You need to backup your database before you can create a Log File. Click OK to start the backup.

trans-unit.source: The correct Log File for this data file could not be found. Try to find it. If you cannot find the Log File, make a full backup of the data before creating a Log File.
trans-unit.target: The correct Log File for this data file could not be found. Try to find it. If you cannot find the Log File, make a full backup of the data before creating a Log File.

trans-unit.source: The link between the data file and the log file is not valid anymore (the data file has probably been moved). You must open a valid log file or create a new one.
trans-unit.target: The link between the data file and the log file is not valid anymore (the data file has probably been moved). You must open a valid log file or create a new one.

trans-unit.source: The correct log file for this data file could not be found. You can try to locate the current log file or you can create a new one. If you decide to create a new one, the log file will not be activated until the next backup.
trans-unit.target: The correct log file for this data file could not be found. You can try to locate the current log file or you can create a new one. If you decide to create a new one, the log file will not be activated until the next backup.

trans-unit.source: Integrate one or more log file(s) after restore
trans-unit.target: Integrate one or more log file(s) after restore

trans-unit.source: The old Log File cannot be opened again. You are now working without a Log File.
trans-unit.target: The old Log File cannot be opened again. You are now working without a Log File.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the Log File already exists. (Perhaps the previous backup was interrupted.)
trans-unit.target: A copy of the Log File already exists. (Perhaps the previous backup was interrupted.)

trans-unit.source: A new Log File cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: A new Log File cannot be created.

trans-unit.source: The new Log File cannot be opened.
trans-unit.target: The new Log File cannot be opened.

group.resname: Backup dlg weekly save hour list
Backup dlg monthly save day list

trans-unit.source: Waiting for all transactions and indexing to complete.
trans-unit.target: Waiting for all transactions and indexing to complete.

trans-unit.source: There is no Log File for this database.
trans-unit.target: There is no Log File for this database.

trans-unit.source: Backup only if the data file has been modified
trans-unit.target: Backup only if the data file has been modified

trans-unit.source: Delete oldest backup file before backup
trans-unit.target: Delete oldest backup file before backup

trans-unit.source: Retry at the next scheduled date and time
trans-unit.target: Retry at the next scheduled date and time

trans-unit.source: Restore last backup if database is damaged
trans-unit.target: Restore last backup if database is damaged

trans-unit.source: Integrate last log if database is incomplete
trans-unit.target: Integrate last log if database is incomplete

trans-unit.source: If active transactions or index operations:
trans-unit.target: If active transactions or index operations:

trans-unit.source: Always wait for the end of operations
trans-unit.target: Always wait for the end of operations

trans-unit.source: Data file does not contain the last operations.
trans-unit.target: Data file does not contain the last operations.

trans-unit.source: Open database with a new log file
trans-unit.target: Open database with a new log file

trans-unit.source: Rename the damaged data file to {FileName} and restore the last archive
trans-unit.target: Rename the damaged data file to {FileName} and restore the last archive

trans-unit.source: Delete the damaged data file before restoring
trans-unit.target: Delete the damaged data file before restoring

trans-unit.source: Destination folder of the restored files:
trans-unit.target: Destination folder of the restored files:

trans-unit.source: The log file is damaged. You should make a backup then create a new log file.
trans-unit.target: The log file is damaged. You should make a backup then create a new log file.

trans-unit.source: The last operations recorded in the log file were not flushed in the data file.\rThey are now automatically recovered.
trans-unit.target: The last operations recorded in the log file were not flushed in the data file.\rThey are now automatically recovered.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to open the restored database ?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to open the restored database ?

trans-unit.source: Warning: This operation cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Warning: This operation cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

trans-unit.source: The backup file destination folder is invalid. Do you want to select a new pathname?\rIf you cancel, 4D will use their default destination folder.
trans-unit.target: The backup file destination folder is invalid. Do you want to select a new pathname?\rIf you cancel, 4D will use their default destination folder.

trans-unit.source: A transaction is opened in this process. The backup cannot be launched.
trans-unit.target: A transaction is opened in this process. The backup cannot be launched.

trans-unit.source: The maximum timeout for transactions to end in a concurent process has been reached. The backup cannot be launched.
trans-unit.target: The maximum timeout for transactions to end in a concurent process has been reached. The backup cannot be launched.

trans-unit.source: Cannot find the backup file to be checked.
trans-unit.target: Cannot find the backup file to be checked.

trans-unit.source: Cannot find the log backup file to be checked.
trans-unit.target: Cannot find the log backup file to be checked.

trans-unit.source: Error during log backup file check.
trans-unit.target: Error during log backup file check.

trans-unit.source: The list below shows all the performed operations recorded in the log file since the last backup.
trans-unit.target: The list below shows all the performed operations recorded in the log file since the last backup.

trans-unit.source: By selecting a specific log action in the list above and clicking the Rollback button, 4D Application will close the current data file, restore and open the specified backup of the database and perform all the above logged actions including the selected one.
trans-unit.target: By selecting a specific log action in the list above and clicking the Rollback button, 4D Application will close the current data file, restore and open the specified backup of the database and perform all the above logged actions including the selected one.

trans-unit.source: The rollback operation cannot be undone, but the current data file will be renamed and stored on the disk.
trans-unit.target: The rollback operation cannot be undone, but the current data file will be renamed and stored on the disk.

trans-unit.source: An error has been detected during the log file integration. You must restore the data from your last backup in order to integrate all the operations contained in the log file.
trans-unit.target: An error has been detected during the log file integration. You must restore the data from your last backup in order to integrate all the operations contained in the log file.

trans-unit.source: The archive was restored correctly. Do you want to open the restored database?
trans-unit.target: The archive was restored correctly. Do you want to open the restored database?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to integrate another log file?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to integrate another log file?

trans-unit.source: The file you have chosen is not a valid log file. Do you want to choose another one?
trans-unit.target: The file you have chosen is not a valid log file. Do you want to choose another one?

trans-unit.source: Right click in column headers to display specific fields.
trans-unit.target: Right click in column headers to display specific fields.

trans-unit.source: This command cannot be used in a client/server environment
trans-unit.target: This command cannot be used in a client/server environment

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of successive backup attempts has been reached. The automatic backup scheduler is temporarily deactivated. It will be reactivated subsequent to a manual backup or when the database is restarted.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of successive backup attempts has been reached. The automatic backup scheduler is temporarily deactivated. It will be reactivated subsequent to a manual backup or when the database is restarted.

trans-unit.source: Double click on a line to get more information about the selected element.
trans-unit.target: Double click on a line to get more information about the selected element.

trans-unit.source: The log file will be activated after the next backup of the data file. Do you want to start the backup automatically?
trans-unit.target: The log file will be activated after the next backup of the data file. Do you want to start the backup automatically?

trans-unit.source: You pressed the "Alt" key. You can choose to create a new data file, to open an existing one or to restore a backup file. Click on "Cancel" to open the database with the default data file.
trans-unit.target: You pressed the "Alt" key. You can choose to create a new data file, to open an existing one or to restore a backup file. Click on "Cancel" to open the database with the default data file.

trans-unit.source: The archive was restored correctly. Do you want to integrate a log file?
trans-unit.target: The archive was restored correctly. Do you want to integrate a log file?

trans-unit.source: {count} operations were successfully integrated. Do you want to integrate another log file?
trans-unit.target: {count} operations were successfully integrated. Do you want to integrate another log file?

trans-unit.source: Choose a log file to integrate.
trans-unit.target: Choose a log file to integrate.
